meta.label: Join and keep unmatched (deprecated)
meta.description: Join two datasets and create additional datasets of unmatched rows. ⚠️ Starting with DSS version 11.3 this plugin is considered "deprecated", we recommend using the native [join unmatched](https://doc.dataiku.com/dss/latest/other_recipes/join.html#adding-output-datasets-for-unmatched-rows) feature instead.
meta.author: Dataiku (Kasim PATEL)
